kit.leader_skill: PHY Type Ki +3 and HP, ATK & DEF +100%

super_attack.name: Kamehameha (Extreme)
super_attack.effect: Greatly raises ATK & DEF for 1 turn; Causes supreme damage to enemy; Greatly lowers DEF

passive_skill.name: Disturbance-Curbing Energy
passive_skill.effect: (Forever) Ki +3 and ATK & DEF 100% up; (Forever) All allies' Ki +3; (Forever) "Kamehameha" Category allies' ATK 40% up; (Forever) "DB Saga" Category allies' DEF 40% up; (Forever) "Earthlings" Category allies' chance of performing a critical hit 5% up; At the start of each turn: (Forever) ATK & DEF 50% up (up to 150%); When attacking with 12 or more Ki: ATK & DEF 150% up; When there is a "Turtle School" Category ally on the team: Randomly changes Ki Spheres of a certain Type (PHY excluded) to Rainbow Ki Spheres; For every Rainbow Ki Sphere obtained: Damage reduction rate 10% up; When HP is 50% or less: (Once) Changes Ki Spheres: PHY to Rainbow; (Once) ATK 150% up; (Once) High chance of performing a critical hit; (Once) All allies' ATK & DEF 20% up for 3 turns

lines.text: "Earthlings" Category allies' chance of performing a critical hit 5% up

lines.context: At the start of each turn
When attacking with 12 or more Ki

lines.text: Randomly changes Ki Spheres of a certain Type (PHY excluded) to Rainbow Ki Spheres
lines.context: When there is a "Turtle School" Category ally on the team
For every Rainbow Ki Sphere obtained

lines.text: Changes Ki Spheres: PHY to Rainbow
lines.context: When HP is 50% or less
When HP is 50% or less

lines.text: High chance of performing a critical hit
lines.context: When HP is 50% or less

lines.text: All allies' ATK & DEF 20% up for 3 turns
